description: Numerators of Taylor series expansion of log(x/sin(x)). For n>0, numerators of zeta(2*n)/Pi^(2*n).
comments: Equivalently, numerator of (-1)^n*2^(2*n-1)*Bernoulli(2*n)/(2*n)!. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jun 26 2003Numerator(Zeta(0)/Pi^0) = -1. [_Artur Jasinski_, Mar 11 2010]
